title: @Rito Forum Problems...Again.
body:
Cant post attachments.

Uploading does not start, cant upload attachment after the fact either.

Also, forums still redirect me to NA/EUW at random times when on forums.

replies.body:
>Also, forums still redirect me to NA/EUW at random times when on forums.

If you go to any NA/EUW site for riot (for example say just the NA home page instead of the normal one) this happens, honestly i think it's %%%%ty design but that has been in it since the start.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kQHPE1EB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-24T07:45:19.389+0000)
>
> If you go to any NA/EUW site for riot (for example say just the NA home page instead of the normal one) this happens, honestly i think it's %%%%ty design but that has been in it since the start.

But its not just that.

That's all it's been for me (it also counts the fantasy draft pages as well etc.)

If it's been for more try and work out what from.
just upload it to imgur or something.
To add on to this, posts say they were submitted 23/24 hours ago when they were posted 10 minutes ago.
